Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.Dates

Class Calendar

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.Dates.Calendar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Calendar extends Object implements Serializable
The Calendar is a structure used for storage of data (in the form of Entries), sorted by date.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • months

      private final LinkedList<Month> months
      A list of months. The first element of this list is either one month earlier than the currently active month or the first month, where an Entry was made. The last element of this list is either two months into the future from the currently active month or the month that is the furthest in the future, where an Entry was made.

    • currentMonthIndex

      private int currentMonthIndex
      The index of the currently displayed month pointing to where in the LinkedList "months" it is saved.

  • Constructor Details

    • Calendar

      public Calendar(Date date)
      Creates 1 month back, the current month and 2 month into the future, starting from the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to be used for generation of months.

  • Method Details

    • getMonths

      public LinkedList<Month> getMonths()
      Returns the currently saved months.
      Returns:
      A LinkedList containing the months, starting from the earliest in time.

    • getCurrentMonthIndex

      public int getCurrentMonthIndex()
      Returns the index of the current month.
      Returns:
      The index of the current month.

    • shiftCalendar

      public void shiftCalendar(boolean rightShift)
      Shifts the calendar to the left or right according to the given value. If a Month that now ranges out of the 4-month period covered by the Calendar does not have any entries, it is removed.
      Parameters:
      rightShift - true: shift to the right; false: shift to the left

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(Entry e)
      Adds an Entry to the current month.
      Parameters:
      e - The Entry to be added.

    • remove

      public void remove(Entry e)
      Removes an Entry from the current month.
      Parameters:
      e - The Entry to be removed.

    • getEntry

      public Entry getEntry(Date date)
      Returns the Entry connected to the specified date or null if there is no such Entry in the current month.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the Entry.
      Returns:
      The Entry connected to the date or null.

    • getDay

      public Day getDay(Date date)
      Returns the Day connected to the given date or null if the date is outside the current month.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the day.
      Returns:
      The Day corresponding to the given date.

    • getWeek

      public Day[] getWeek(int week)
      Returns the Day-array connected to the given week number
      Parameters:
      week - The date of the day.
      Returns:
      The Day-Array representing the week corresponding to the given number.

    • getMonth

      public Month getMonth()
      Returns the current month.
      Returns:
      The current month.
